title: Strife Before Dawn
description: In the last years of the French and Indian War, a young woman on the Pennsylvania frontier is kidnapped by raiding Indians. Mistakenly believing her husband dead, she eventually marries an Indian brave, and has a child by him. Meanwhile, her first husband finds himself attracted to an aristocratic beauty --and then the couple are reunited by a treaty that brings about the forced repatriation of the "captives." Schuman follows the interlocking fortunes of these five people down the years through the end of the Revolutionary War.
author: Mary Schumann
